title: Can i get placed higher than bronze if i have never played ranked before?

replies.body: Yes. I remember a post last year where some guy got Gold 4 just before the ranked season ended
In my first promo series, I think I went 5-5, getting carried there.  Got placed in Silver 4, so yes it is totally possible.
I believe you can get Silver 1 or Gold 5 (depending on stats) if you go 10-0 without having ranked before! {{summoner:14}}
